channel.title: VPS problem... again
channel.description: Ok so i realized i just hadn't revieved my VPS yet yesterday. I recieved it today and logged onto it via Remote Desktop Connection I downloaded Java and sent my source to the comp. But when i run it i cant connect using teh ip they sent me. Also how do i make it so i can leave the source open 24/7 because when i log off the remote desktop it closes my run batch. thanks

item.title: VPS problem... again
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Bmaw, post:1, topic:290706”]Ok so i realized i just hadn’t revieved my VPS yet yesterday.
I recieved it today and logged onto it via Remote Desktop Connection
I downloaded Java and sent my source to the comp.
But when i run it i cant connect using teh ip they sent me.
Also how do i make it so i can leave the source open 24/7 because when i log off the remote desktop it closes my run batch.
thanks[/quote]

Don’t log off, just click the x button near the top middle of the screen.

Read full topic
